name: Atomik Blind Threat of Doom
description:
!!!!!!! Works best if downloaded !!!!!!!

Atomik Blind Threat of Doom is a game made for the exhibition "Atomik Bazar" in Fribourg as part of the series "Atomik [...] of Doom".

In an epic war between ships and silent threats (submarines), you are tasked to destroy the enemy by guiding a torpedo through a treacherous reef full of sea-mines and sharks.

Will you be able to make it to the top and destroy the enemy?

Move with Left and Right arrow keys Press Space ton launch a torpedo Press S to skip the intro sequence

Follow us on twitter: @SharpedStoneStd
Follow us on Facebook: @SharpedStoneStudios
